committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to permit an exchange of Laurel Hill recreation demonstration area land located in Somerset County, Pennsylvania, for public park, recreational, or conservation purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to permit the State of Pennsylvania to exchange Federal lands of the Laurel Hill recreation demonstration area for lands for public park, recreational, or conservation purposes. Permits the Secretary to execute a release of any condition giving reversion rights to the United States of such lands only if certain defined conditions are met.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to permit an exchange of Laurel Hill recreation demonstration area land located in Somerset County, Pennsylvania, for public park, recreational, or conservation purposes.
